code:
-spec check_array(Nums :: [integer()], K :: integer()) -> boolean().
check_array(Nums, K) ->
    check_array_helper(Nums, K, 0, 0, []).

check_array_helper([], _, _, 0, []) -> true;
check_array_helper([H|T], K, Index, Carry, Ops) when Index < K ->
    NewOps = [H+Carry | Ops],
    RequiredDec = lists:last(NewOps),
    if
        RequiredDec < 0 -> false;
        true -> 
            NewCarry = if RequiredDec > 0 -> RequiredDec; true -> 0 end,
            check_array_helper(T, K, Index+1, NewCarry, NewOps)
    end;
check_array_helper([H|T], K, Index, Carry, [FirstOp|RestOps]) ->
    NewOp = H + Carry,
    RequiredDec = NewOp - FirstOp,
    if
        RequiredDec < 0 -> false;
        true -> 
            NewCarry = if RequiredDec > 0 -> RequiredDec + Carry; true -> Carry end,
            check_array_helper(T, K, Index+1, NewCarry, [NewOp|RestOps])
    end;
check_array_helper([], _, _, _, _) -> false.
